recipe_name: Green beans with spring onions and parsley butter
author: Tony Tobin
method: Cook the beans in a saucepan of boiling, salted water for 3-4 minutes, or until they have softened slightly but are not cooked through, then drain.  Melt the butter in a frying pan until foaming, then add the beans, sliced spring onions, and salt and pepper. Cook for 2-3 minutes.  Drizzle the vegetables with the honey and stir in the parsley, then serve.
ingredients: 150g/5Â½oz green beans, trimmed,  25g/1oz butter,  3 spring onions, sliced,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 tbsp honey,  2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley
